articles.author: CNN
articles.title: Record-breaking megaflash lightning documented in North and South America - 9News
articles.description: Two new world records for megaflashes of lightning have been recorded by the World Meteorological Organisation (WMO), including one for longest distance of a singular flash in North America and one for longest duration in South America
